textAfterTable: Show your loyalty to the Baratheons in the Game of Thrones Distressed Baratheon Sigil T-Shirt. The youngest of the great houses, born during the Wars of Conquest upon the defeat of Argiliac the Arrogant, the Baratheon sigil is a crowned stag. This shirt bears a distinct distressed look to the designan oversized Baratheon logo is placed off-center for even more style. S M L XL XXL XXXL Shirt Length 28" 29" 30" 31" 32" 33" Shoulder Width 18" 20" 22" 24" 26" 28" Sleeve Length 7.25" 7.75" 8.25" 8.75" 9.25" 9.75" REVIEW SNAPSHOT® by PowerReviews HBO Game of Thrones Distressed Baratheon Sigil T-Shirt   4.5 (based on 11 reviews) 91% of respondents would recommend this to a friend.
